title: Emmanuel Mlundwa
text: Emmanuel Mlundwa (born 17 April 1957) is a Tanzanian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201980%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Flyweight">men's flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1980%20Summer%20Olympics">1980 Summer Olympics</a>.
